00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using System.Management;
00028 #endregion
00029 
00030 namespace Utilities.Environment.DataTypes
00031 {
00035     public class BIOS
00036     {
00037         #region Constructor
00038 
00045         public BIOS(string Name="",string UserName="",string Password="")
00046         {
00047             try
00048             {
00049                 LoadBIOS(Name, UserName, Password);
00050             }
00051             catch { throw; }
00052         }
00053 
00054         #endregion
00055 
00056         #region Properties
00057 
00061         public string SerialNumber { get; set; }
00062 
00063         #endregion
00064 
00065         #region Private Functions
00066 
00073         private void LoadBIOS(string Name, string UserName, string Password)
00074         {
00075             try
00076             {
00077                 ManagementScope Scope = null;
00078                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00079                 {
00080                     ConnectionOptions Options = new ConnectionOptions();
00081                     Options.Username = UserName;
00082                     Options.Password = Password;
00083                     Scope = new ManagementScope("\\\\" + Name + "\\root\\cimv2", Options);
00084                 }
00085                 else
00086                 {
00087                     Scope = new ManagementScope("\\\\" + Name + "\\root\\cimv2");
00088                 }
00089                 Scope.Connect();
00090                 ObjectQuery Query = new ObjectQuery("SELECT * FROM Win32_BIOS");
00091                 using (ManagementObjectSearcher Searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher(Scope, Query))
00092                 {
00093                     using (ManagementObjectCollection Collection = Searcher.Get())
00094                     {
00095                         foreach (ManagementObject TempBIOS in Collection)
00096                         {
00097                             SerialNumber = TempBIOS.Properties["Serialnumber"].Value.ToString();
00098                         }
00099                     }
00100                 }
00101             }
00102             catch { throw; }
00103         }
00104 
00105         #endregion
00106     }
00107 }
